text: Cukier is a Polish surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Aniela Cukier (1900–1944), Polish painter * Józef Cukier (18891960), Polish leader of the Goralenvolk during World War II * Wolf Cukier, American high school student and NASA intern who discovered a new planet (now known as TOI 1338 b) in July 2019 at the age of 17 Cukier also means "sugar" in Polish. Category:Polish-language surnames Category:Jewish surnames
title: Cukier
